name: Galleon (itch)
description:
Fly around and kill stuff

  • WASD controls

Your ship is randomized each time with different guns:

  • Light Gray = Machine gun
  • Dark Gray = Cannon
  • Red = Shotgun
  • Blue = Homing missiles

Try to orient your ship to avoid incoming projectiles and make your guns face enemies so they can shoot

Work in Progress! I will add questing, ship customization, scoring and more stuff
